sec.div: Measuring the moisture content of the films
sec.p: The film pieces were cut in 3 × 3 mm and each was weighed. The measured value was placed as the initial weight. Sample pieces were then placed in an oven at 90°C until the final dry weight. Samples were then weighed and the value was considered as dry weight (Hosseini, Razavi, & Mousavi, 2009).
